trans-unit.source: A collection of all SharePoint features defined in the SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 在 SharePoint 项目中定义的所有 SharePoint 功能的集合。

trans-unit.source: Features defined in the project may or may not be included to the solution package associated with the project.
trans-unit.target: 在项目中定义的功能可能或可能不包含向解决方案包与项目关联。

trans-unit.source: Features can be referenced from packages associated with other projects.
trans-unit.target: 可以从与其他项目关联的包中引用功能。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new feature.
trans-unit.target: 添加新功能。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能的对象。

trans-unit.source: When <see langword="true" />, do not add the feature to the project package.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，不要向项目包添加该功能。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new feature.
trans-unit.target: 添加新功能。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the project or package file cannot be checked out
trans-unit.target: 无法签出项目或包文件时发生

trans-unit.source: The name of the feature.
trans-unit.target: 功能的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new feature using the specified feature name.
trans-unit.target: 添加使用指定功能名称的新功能。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the project file cannot be checked out
trans-unit.target: 无法签出项目文件时发生

trans-unit.source: The feature name.
trans-unit.target: 功能名称。

trans-unit.source: When <see langword="true" />, do not add the feature to the project package.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，不要向项目包添加该功能。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new feature using the specified feature name.
trans-unit.target: 添加使用指定功能名称的新功能。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the project or package file cannot be checked out
trans-unit.target: 无法签出项目或包文件时发生

trans-unit.source: The ID of the feature.
trans-unit.target: 功能的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature" /> with the specified ID.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定 ID 的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature" /> folder path.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature" /> 文件夹路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature" /> with the specified folder path.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定文件夹路径的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the SharePoint feature if it is found; <see langword="null" /> (or <see langword="Nothing" /> in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果它找到，则 SharePoint 功能的一个实例<see langword="null" /> (或<see langword="Nothing" />中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 否则为。

trans-unit.source: The folder path can be an absolute folder path, a relative path to the project folder, or a folder name.
trans-unit.target: 文件夹路径可以是绝对文件夹路径，指向项目文件夹或文件夹名称的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProject" /> to which the features are associated.
trans-unit.target: 与功能关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProject" />。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 SharePoint 项目的对象。
